#include <bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
int main()
{
	int t;
	scanf("%d", &t);
	while(t--)
	{
		int n;
		scanf("%d", &n);
		int maxdeg = -1, ans = -1;
		for (int i = 1; i <= n; ++i)
		{
			int cdeg = 0;
			for (int j = 1; j <= n; ++j)
			{
				int x;
				scanf("%d", &x);
				if(x)
					cdeg++;
			}
			if(cdeg > maxdeg)
			{
				maxdeg = cdeg;
				ans = i;
			}
		}
		if(n == 1)
			printf("0 1\n");
		else
		{
			if(maxdeg == n-1)
				printf("1 %d\n", ans);
			else
				printf("2 %d\n", ans);
		}
	}
	return 0;
}
